title: FSI shall be limited to 0
clause_text: FSI shall be limited to 0.04 maximum with a maximum built-up area of 150 sq.m. Note - Coastal belt is the area within 1 km. from the sea for the purpose of this Regulation.
section: 1.0 LAND USE CLASSIFICATION AND PERMISSIBLE USES

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: FSI shall be limited to 0.04 maximum with a maximum built-up area of 150 sq.m.
